programme.title: Cam & Leon Ep02

programme.title: Oggy & the Cockroaches Ep64

programme.title: Laki Masak, Bini Lucky Ep06
programme.desc: Menampilkan pasangan selebriti iaitu Nabila Huda dan suami di mana suaminya akan memasak hidangan berbeza menggunakan satu bahan sama pada setiap minggu untuk si isteri.

programme.title: Alif Ba Ta Ep04

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Ep03
programme.desc: Kandungan sketsa kali ini merangkumi gelagat pasangan berfoya di taman. Anak- anak dan menantu merebut wasiat ayah

programme.title: Mesyuarat Tingkap Ep01
programme.desc: Membincangkan tentang hal-hal agama dari sudut sosial dan kehidupan seharian yang menjadi kekeliruan masyarakat dengan menampilkan seorang host selebriti serta pendakwah

programme.title: Jawapan Panas Ep15

programme.title: Islamic Fillers
programme.desc: Mengandungi ayat-ayat suci Al-Quran dan Surah

programme.title: Kiblat Yang Hilang Ep15
programme.desc: Ustazah Ru menjelaskan kepada Kak Sal dan Solehah tentang perihal ajaran sesat dan perbuatan mensyirikkan Allah. Solehah menyesal dan sedikit demi sedikit mula menyedari kesilapannya.

programme.title: Yang Bakal Mati Ramadan Ini Ep15

programme.title: Roller Kata Ep01

programme.title: Chronokids Ep04
programme.desc: Kembar Marvin dan Adle menemui telefon bimbit yang dapat meneleport mereka sepanjang masa. Oleh itu, tentu saja, mereka tidak dapat melepaskan peluang untuk memanfaatkan hasil bertuah mereka

programme.title: Tuhan Beri Kami Cinta Ep37

programme.title: Diva Popular Ep10
programme.desc: Lola Kartika dan Dato Rona saling bermusuh. Sejarah berulang kembali apabila anak mereka, Ika Natela dan Erma Erika merebut Syahiwan Afil. Sekali lagi perang melanda diantara Lola Kartika dan Dato Rona!

programme.title: Pop Yeah Yeah Ep01

programme.desc: Watch CTI news bulletin for Taiwan's breaking news and current affairs.

programme.title: Focus New Asia
programme.desc: Coming to you at 1 PM and 7 PM on weekdays, this news program reports on both international and regional events, providing a fresh perspective on Asia and the world

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: This daring political talk show gives Taiwanese a voice, revealing the truth on a broad range of controversial topics.

programme.title: Play it My Way
programme.desc: This Taiwanese talkshow features prominent experts, scholars and organizations in the discussion of current affairs, controversial political news, and events moving Taiwan and the world.

programme.title: Super Followers
programme.desc: Local superstar Jacky Wu and his daughter Sandy co-host for the first time, merging the best of variety and talk for an intellectual audience.

programme.title: CTI News Global Vision
programme.desc: This news update features international news events, special analyses and dialogues from public figures. Receive comprehensive and diverse perspectives of events moving the world today.

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: In this Leslie Cheung screen classic, Maggie Cheung, Anita Mui and Leslie himself are entangled in a bittersweet love triangle.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: Martial arts greats Lau Kar Leung and Alexander Fu play out the vendetta of General Yang and the creation of the unique eight-diagram pole fight technique.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: Andy Lau returns in his role as the Casino Tycoon of Macau, Benny Ho, who eventually becomes embroiled in a plot to destroy the competition.

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: This tale of hidden treasure features the legendary Alexander Fu Sheng as a young wushu warrior, in a film considered director Chu Yuan's best ever.

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: When Stephen Chow takes on the role of delivery boy-turn-boxing ace, he creates a whole new angle on Hong Kong's comedy scene.

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt official's obsessive bid to find a hidden treasure leads him to jail and torture his daughter's lover, and bury her alive!

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: It's payback time when an arrogant god is sentenced to Earth as a monk. To save himself, he must convince three hopeless individuals to change their fate!Stars Stephen Chow, Anita Mui, Maggie Cheung

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: In this gem from Chang Cheh, it's a battle between security agencies and five powerful fighters as they brawl until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose after a bodyguard's boss' son learns that his mistress has slept with his dad's employee.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: Award-winning director Chang Cheh depicts the struggle of the Shaolin monasteries when the Ching Dynasty sets trap to separate and destroy them.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: An alluring female fairy seeks love among mortals and finds it in a man who takes care of an orphanage.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: This time, an angry man chases Lolanto all over Hong Kong, as he tries to deal with his feelings for the odd daughter of a wealthy mobster.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha

programme.title: All About Ah Long
programme.desc: When Ah Long's ex-girlfriend resurfaces after a 10-year absence to take their son away from him, he must make a painful choice about what is best for the boy.

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: Two stories of first loves: A bizarre yet romantic tale of a lonely young man falling in love with a sleepwalker. And a married grocer faces the vengeful first love that he once rejected.

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga

programme.title: Phantom of the Theatre

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: A girl who faces bullying and humiliation in school. A boy who struggles to come to terms with having a family with close ties to the underworld. What binds them together and what drives them to kill?

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A videotape; a phone call; and seven days to her own death. An investigative reporter has only seven days to unravel the mystery of The Ring.

programme.title: Syriana
programme.desc: George Clooney is a ready-to-retire CIA veteran who gets sucked into a dangerous conspiracy on his last mission in the Middle East.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: A royal visit from the King and Queen of England unleashes scandal, romance and intrigue that leave the future of Downton hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Getaway
programme.desc: A washed-up racer must drive as commanded by a mysterious man to save the life of his kidnapped wife.

programme.title: The Kitchen

programme.desc: A career con man sets his sights on his latest mark a recently widowed woman, worth millions. But as the two draw closer, what should have been another simple swindle takes on the ultimate stakes.

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

programme.title: Hugo

programme.desc: A prisoner and a CIA agent have to learn to rely on each other to survive as they make their way to South Africa.

programme.title: Constantine
